channel.title: New Source&Client - Help ( stuff etc )
channel.description:
Hi, i've played on many priv servers ( and RS2 ) for some years, and i got a lot of free time, so now i'ce choosen to try make my own server. But i got no idea what to do or what i need, so please: [b]Post stuff i need to make my server here![/b]
It would be so nice of you if you could give me a download link to like JDK, or something ( getting that now ). Please give me ideas.

item.title: New Source&Client - Help ( stuff etc )

item.description:
@jester01445 wrote:

are you serious your basically asking us tooo spoon feed try looking in the tutorial section maybe read a couple of them…

Read full topic

item.description:
@DjZippe wrote:

Please tell me how to add Commands, NPC’s ( so they respawn would be best ) shops etc etc

item.title: New Source&Client - Help ( stuff etc )
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

Hello again
Add me on MSN, I’ve already sent a request to your set Hotmail on your account.
To get a blank server go to Download Section there are heaps.
A client, search for Kihomura’s blank client.

(Link to JDK 6U11 - Here.)
Link should work.

Read full topic
